groups.description: The JSON object contained in the groups array can contain the attributes.

name.description: The full name of the group.

type.description: The class name of the data type of the group.

description.description: A short description of the group that can be displayed to users.

sourceType.description: The class name of the source that contributed this group.

sourceMethod.description: The full name of the method (include parenthesis and argument types) that contributed this group.

properties.description: The JSON object contained in the properties array can contain the attributes .

name.description: The full name of the property.

type.description: The full signature of the data type of the property but also a full generic type.

description.description: A short description of the property that can be displayed to users.

sourceType.description: The class name of the source that contributed this property.

defaultValue.description: TThe default value, which is used if the property is not specified.

deprecation.description: Specify whether the property is deprecated.

reason.description: A short description of the reason why the property was deprecated.

replacement.description: The full name of the property that replaces this deprecated property.

since.description: The version in which the property became deprecated.

hints.description: The JSON object contained in the hints array can contain the attributes.

name.description: The full name of the property to which this hint refers

values.description: A list of valid values as defined by the ValueHint object.

value.description: A valid value for the element to which the hint refers.

description.description: A short description of the value that can be displayed to users.

providers.description: A list of value providers for dynamic hints.

name.description: The name of the provider to use to offer additional content assistance for the element to which the hint refers.

parameters.description: Any additional parameter that the provider supports.
